                            public P setUpdatePlayProgressDelayMs(long updatePlayProgressDelayMs)
                            Description copied from interface: IPlayer
                            Sets the updatePlayProgress delay.

                            More accurate to handle progress type work.

                            • IPlayer.setAB(long, long)
                            • IPlayer.setABLoop(int, int)
                            • IPlayer.setAB(long, long, int, int)
                            • IPlayer.setEnabledPositionUnitLoop(boolean, int, int)
                            • IPlayer.Listener.onPlayProgress(long, long)
                            • IPlayer.Listener.onABProgress(long, long, int)
                            • IPlayer.Listener.onPositionUnitProgress(long, int, int)
                            • ......
                              Specified by:
                              setUpdatePlayProgressDelayMs in interface IPlayer<P extends APlayer>
                              Parameters:
                              updatePlayProgressDelayMs - value>=0?value:default[1000 - (position % 1000)]

                            • updatePlayProgressInterruptConditions

                              protected boolean updatePlayProgressInterruptConditions()
                              Returns:
                              true: interrupt update Play Progress

                            • updatePlayProgress

                              protected void updatePlayProgress(int updatePlayProgressCommand)
                              Parameters:
                              updatePlayProgressCommand -
                              • 0: interrupt update
                              • 1: go update
                              • n: go update(no Change base interrupt conditions)

                            • setEnabledPositionUnitLoop

                              public P setEnabledPositionUnitLoop(boolean enabled,
                                    int loopMode,
                                    int loopInterval)
                              Description copied from interface: IPlayer
                              Set the enabled,loopMode,loopInterval of this position unit loop, with reset position unit looped count tag

                              *param loopMode,loopInterval can use C.PARAM_ORIGINAL keeping the original values

                              *param loopMode,loopInterval can use C.PARAM_UNSET/C.PARAM_RESET unset/reset values

                              Specified by:
                              setEnabledPositionUnitLoop in interface IPlayer<P extends APlayer>
                              Parameters:
                              enabled - True [position unit] loop is enabled, false otherwise.
                              loopMode - [Position unit] loop mode
                              • -1 disable
                              • -8 infinity loop
                              • 0++ specified loop
                                loopInterval - [Position unit] loop interval
                                See Also:
                                IPlayer.setUpdatePlayProgressDelayMs(long)

                              • positionUnitLoopProcessing

                                protected int positionUnitLoopProcessing(int processFrom)
                                Parameters:
                                processFrom -
                                • 1: from onPositionUnitProgress(..end)
                                • 2: from onCompletion()
                                  Returns:
                                  • 0: disable
                                  • 1: enable(processing[infinity/specified loop | loop index list])
                                  • 2: enable(finish[specified loop | not loop])

                                          • setEnabledWifiLock

                                            public P setEnabledWifiLock(boolean enabled)
                                            Description copied from interface: IPlayer
                                            Set enabled wifi lock, to hold a Wifi lock, which prevents the player from going to sleep while the media is playing.

                                            RequiresPermission(Manifest.permission.WAKE_LOCK)

                                            AndroidManifest.xml add below 

                                             <!--Using a WifiLock For KMedia Player-->
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WAKE_LOCK"/>
                                            Specified by:
                                            setEnabledWifiLock in interface IPlayer<P extends APlayer>
